TopicTitle: Compact Glide Pod - for Stealth Orbital Insertions (tested using NEAR; should work w/ stock aero)

Articles.Content:
Need a compact one-Kerbal drop pod for an orbital insertion? Worried about parachutes giving away the location of your covert operative?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Made entirely with stock parts, the Glide Pod fits (just) in a CRG-08 Mk 2 cargo bay and comes with RCS thrusters and monopropellant engines. Use engines to deorbit, glide through re-entry, then point the nose straight down and fire the nose-mounted engines to decelerate to under 45m/s.
That's an oddly creative way to send drop pods down! Who needs parachutes anyway?
I made something similar, its a open cockpit "Space glider", which can go from space and land "safely". Comes with emergency parachutes for your emergency parachuting needs. Your's really nice tho
